a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Age-standardized suicide rates: comparison of sources
The death rate by suicide per 100,000 individuals in each age group. This is compared between the WHO
Mortality Database (reported data submitted from each country), IHME GBD (modeled estimates), and WHO
Global Health Estimates (reported data with adjustment for underreporting; or GBD estimates in countries
Data source: WHO Mortality Database (2024); World Health Organization (2024); IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: For comparisons across time and between countries, this metric is age-standardized.
